name: mi-go mutagenic primer
description: A super-concentrated mutagen strongly resembling a lava lamp.  You need a syringe to inject it and prime your body for mutation.

use_action.activation_message: You inject the mi-go mutagenic primer.

name: mi-go mutagen
description: An extremely rare mutagen cocktail, it smells of sulphur and glows orange.
A super-concentrated mutagen not for those frightened of this thing they have become.  You need a syringe to inject it and prime your body for mutation.

use_action.activation_message: You inject the mastodon mutagenic primer.

description: An extremely rare mutagen cocktail, it seeks to cure what's deep inside.
